law.catch_line: Board not to release agricultural or food system information considered part of critical infrastructure -- Exceptions.

text.section: Except as provided in subsections (2) and (3) of this section, the board shall not release any agricultural or food system records, data, or information considered a part of the critical infrastructure. "Critical infrastructure" shall have the same meaning as in 42 U.S.C. sec. 5195c(e).
Any records, data, or information excluded under application of subsection (1) of this section shall be subject to inspection only upon order of a court of competent jurisdiction.

Nothing in this section shall limit the release of records, data, or information to another state or federal agency if the release of the information is necessary to prevent or control disease or to protect public health, safety, or welfare.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006.
